devdoc.author: Akshat Chajjer, Shivansh Seth, Istasis Mishra
devdoc.details: A smart contract to create listings, view available listings and buy the products

constructor.details: Constructor for the contract. Inits total_listings and unavailable_listings to 0

createListing(string,string,uint256).details: Creates a listing with provided information

params._description: A brief description of the item
params._name: Name of the the listed item (not same as the item string)
params._price: The asking price for the item as decided by the buyer

initiateSale(uint256,string).details: Payable to be called by buyer to initiate the sale. Emits SaleInitiated() to alert the buyer, if the listing is available and the value matches asking price

params._buyer_public_key: Public key corresponding to the buyers private key. This key will be used by the seller to encrypt the item string before transfer. The encryption algorithm has to be decided beforehand (Test cases use RSA)
params._id: ID of the listing to be bought

listItems().details: Returns the list of all available listings

releaseFunds(uint256).details: To be called by buyer on hearing a ItemTransferred() event to confirm that item received is correct and release funds to seller.

transferItem(uint256,string).details: To be called by seller on hearing a SaleInitiated() event. Emits a ItemTransferred() event which provides the encrypted string to the buyer (or anyone else listening)

params._encrypted_item: Item string encrypted with the public key of the buyer
params._id: ID of the item to be transferred

devdoc.title: SolidityMart
